insight: ChatControl's Discord integration requires the DiscordSRV plugin. Users must disable DiscordSRV's built-in chat relay by setting `DiscordChatChannelMinecraftToDiscord: false` in DiscordSRV's `config.yml`, otherwise messages get duplicated. ChatControl checks this on startup and logs a warning if it's still enabled (see ChatControl.java line ~247).

When multiple message groups match in .rs files (e.g., join.rs with Stop_On_First_Match disabled), one-time-per-group operators like `then console`, `then proxy`, and `then warn` are gated by a `firstTimeRun`/`executed` flag that must be reset at the start of each group's `filter()` call. Without the reset, only the first matching group's operators execute — messages still display for all groups but their side-effect operators are silently skipped.
